hero-description: There are many ways to get involved with MapSwipe.
contribute-now-description: MapSwipe offers many ways to engage and contribute to our community. Download the app or go to Mapswipe for Web and start to make an impact as an individual.
possess-language-skills: Are you fluent in other languages?
possess-language-skills-description: Volunteer to help make the mobile app, web app, and website available in more languages.
possess-techincal-skills-description: Volunteer to support mobile and web app development and contribute your expertise to improving MapSwipe.
want-to-host-mapswipe-events: Are you a community, academic, or non-profit group wanting to host MapSwipe events?
want-to-host-mapswipe-events-description: Download our MapSwipe Event Toolkit and start bringing people together by mapping projects.
engage-your-csr: Engage your Corporate Social Responsibility and employees. Make an impact now!
engage-your-csr-description: Register your event details and our team will follow up to explore options for support.
humanitarian-or-nonprofit: Are you a humanitarian or nonprofit organization interested in running a project on MapSwipe?
humanitarian-or-nonprofit-description: Share your idea with us and our team will follow up to determine the right solution.
interested-in-supporting: Interested in supporting MapSwipe with a donation?
interested-in-supporting-description-1: Your donation will help ensure smooth operation, sustainability and maintenance of the mobile and web apps.
contact-section-description: Get in touch with us, we're here to assist you!
